titleStmt.title: S. Austin imitated, or, Retractions and repentings in reference unto the late civil and ecclesiastical changes in this nation by John Ellis.
titleStmt.author: Ellis, John, 1606?-1681.

titleStmt.title: S. Austin imitated, or, Retractions and repentings in reference unto the late civil and ecclesiastical changes in this nation by John Ellis.
titleStmt.author: Ellis, John, 1606?-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Godbid, and are to be sold by Timothy Garthwait,

notesStmt.note: "Wherein I. the grounds of obedience to the crown, of adherence to this church (in doctrine, worship and government), II. an answer to that tractate, entituled, Reasons shewing the necessity of reformation, III. the non-obligation of the covenant, are represented and demonstrated, in 11 books."
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
